name: Uncanny Farming (earliest alpha)
description:
Uncanny Farming is a game about planting and harvesting unique crops to gain money and buy new ones.

The game is currently in a prototype/early alpha stage and content is minimal.

Currently has 5 plants.

Next updates may bring new plants, bugfixes and more.

Donations are highly appreciated to develop this videogame better and faster.

As for now, the game has no save data.

Sound effects are courtesy from Zapsplat.com

Ezermester Games - 2021
